column1: CARD.  1. CARD ONE
DECK.  068. SURVEY NUMBER
BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

FORM. X. IMPORTANT: SEE SPECIAL NOTES IN INTRODUCTION.  1. MATCHED GROUP (CASES IN WHICH IT WAS POSSIBLE TO MATCH A MAN,S FORM 20 CARD WITH THE QUESTIONNAIRE HE FILLED OUT) 2. UNDESIGNATED GROUP 3. UNDESIGNATED GROUP (PERHAPS UNMATCHED FORM 20 CARDS)

Q.1. WHAT BRANCH OF SERVICE ARE YOU IN*  1. ENGINEERS 2. SIGNAL CORPS 3. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 4. ORDNANCE 5. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 6. MILITARY POLICE 7. CHEMICAL WARFARE 8. TRANSPORTATION (PORT, CO., OR BN.) 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.2. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT ANY GRADE OR TECHNICIAN 3RD OR 4TH GRADE 8. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.3. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY*  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. MORE THAN 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. MORE THAN 6 MONTHS UP TO A YEAR 4. OVER A YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS 8. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.4. HOW DID YOU GO INTO THE ARMY*  1. DRAFTED 2. VOLUNTEERED 3. MEMBER OF THE NATIONAL GUARD 8. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.5. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE PAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE* X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.  01. 02. 03. 04. 05. 06. 07. 08. 09. 99. UNDESIGNATED CODE 00. NO ANSWER

Q.6. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL*  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL (OR TRADE SCHOOL) 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.7. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY*  1. UNDER 20 YEARS OF AGE 2. 20-21 3. 22-24 4. 25-29 5. 30-35 6. 35 AND OVER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER X. Q.8A AND Q.8B CODED TOGETHER BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.

Q.8A. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, OR WIDOWED, DIVORCED, SEPARATED*  Q.8B. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY*  1. SINGLE, I AM NOT MARRIED 2. MARRIED, BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 3. MARRIED, AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 4. WIDOWED, DIVORCED, SEPARATED 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.9. WHAT WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*  1. WORKING AT A PAID JOB 2. GOING TO SCHOOL 3. LOOKING FOR WORK 4. OTHER (WHAT*) 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 10-13 NOT CODED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.

Q.13C. HOW LONG HAVE YOU HAD THIS AS YOUR MAIN ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT*  1. UNDER 1 MONTH 2. 1-3 MONTHS 3. 4-6 MONTHS 4. 7-12 MONTHS (1 YEAR) 5. 13 MONTHS OR MORE (OVER 1 YEAR) 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.14. DO YOU SPEND MOST OF YOUR TIME WORKING ON YOUR MAIN ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES, I SPEND MOST OF MY TIME ON MY MAIN ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT 2. NO, I SPEND MOST OF MY TIME ON OTHER DUTIES (IF YOU CHECKED THIS ANSWER, TELL IN DETAIL WHAT THESE OTHER DUTIES ARE) 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.15A. DID YOU EVER HAVE A CHANCE TO SAY WHAT KIND OF AN ARMY JOB YOU WOULD LIKE TO HAVE*  1. YES, I HAD A CHANCE TO SAY 2. NO, I NEVER HAD A CHANCE TO SAY 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.15B. DID YOU GET THE JOB YOU ASKED FOR*  1. I NEVER DID SAY WHAT KIND OF AN ARMY JOB I WOULD LIKE TO HAVE 2. YES, I GOT THE ARMY JOB I ASKED FOR 3. NO, I DID NOT GET THE ARMY JOB I ASKED FOR 8. UNDESIGNATED CODE 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER X. Q.16 NOT CODED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.

Q.17A. IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT HOW MUCH ARE YOU USING THE TRAINING YOU GOT AT THE SPECIALIST SCHOOL YOU WENT TO*  1. I DID NOT GO TO AN ARMY SPECIALIST SCHOOL 2. I USE MY TRAINING ALL THE TIME 3. I USE MY TRAINING MOST OF THE TIME 4. I USE MY TRAINING ABOUT HALF THE TIME 5. I HARDLY EVER USE MY TRAINING 6. I NEVER USE MY TRAINING 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER X. Q.17B NOT CODED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.

Q.18. ARE YOU LEARNING ANY THING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB WHICH YOU THINK YOU WILL BE ABLE TO USE IN A CIVILIAN JOB AFTER THE WAR*  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON,T KNOW 4. UNDESIGNATED CODE 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.19. DO YOU USE THE CIVILIAN TRAINING AND EXPERIENCE YOU HAD BEFORE YOU CAME IN THE ARMY IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES, MOST OF THE TIME 2. YES, ONCE IN A WHILE 3. NO, NEVER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.20. DO YOU THINK YOUR ABILITIES AND PREVIOUS EXPERIENCE FIT YOU BETTER FOR SOME OTHER JOB OR ASSIGNMENT*  1. NO, I AM BEST FITTED FOR MY PRESENT JOB 2. YES, I WOULD FIT BETTER IN A DIFFERENT JOB (WHAT JOB*) 8. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.21. WOULD YOU TRANSFER TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB, IF GIVEN A CHANCE*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 8. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.22. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY JOB WHERE YOU BEST FIT*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 8. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.23. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN DO*  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.24. DO YOU THINK YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB GIVES YOU A FAIR CHANCE OF PROMOTION*  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON,T KNOW 8. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.25. HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JOB*  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. DISSATISFIED 5. VERY DISSATISFIED 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.26. SINCE YOU FINISHED YOUR BASIC TRAINING HAVE YOU EVER ASKED TO BE GIVEN A DIFFERENT ARMY JOB FROM THE ONE YOU HAD*  1. I HAVEN,T FINISHED BASIC TRAINING YET 2. YES, I DID ASK FOR A DIFFERENT JOB 3. NO, I NEVER ASKED FOR A DIFFERENT JOB 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 27-28 NOT CODED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.

Q.29. DID YOU GET THE DIFFERENT JOB YOU ASKED FOR*  1. YES, I GOT THE DIFFERENT JOB 2. NO, I DID NOT GET THE DIFFERENT JOB 3. I AM STILL WAITING TO HEAR 4. I NEVER ASKED FOR A DIFFERENT JOB 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 30-31 NOT CODED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.

Q.32. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE PEOPLE YOU SAW DID EVERYTHING THEY COULD TO GET YOU THE JOB YOU ASKED FOR*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. I NEVER ASKED FOR A DIFFERENT JOB 8. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.33A. THE BRITISH CAN TAKE IT ON THE CHIN AND COME BACK FOR MORE.  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 7. NO ANSWER 8. UNDESIGNATED CODE 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.33B. THE BRITISH ALWAYS TRY TO GET OTHER PEOPLE TO DO THEIR FIGHTING FOR THEM.  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 7. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.33C. WE SHOULD SEE TO IT THAT THE GERMAN PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY AFTER THE WAR FOR ALL THE TROUBLE THEY ARE CAUSING US NOW.  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 7. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.33D. WE SHOULD SEE TO IT THAT THE JAPANESE PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY AFTER THE WAR FOR ALL THE TROUBLE THEY ARE CAUSING US NOW.  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 7. NO ANSWER 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.34. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARMY*  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT IS ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.35. DO YOU THINK A SOLDIER WITH ABILITY HAS A GOOD CHANCE FOR PROMOTION IN THE ARMY*  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. UNDECIDED 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.36. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY OR BATTERY*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 8. UNDESIGNATED CODE 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.37. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JOB*  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 9. UNDESIGNATED CODE 0. NO ANSWER X. Q.38 NOT CODED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.
